column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=The waning importance of history
#Text=Is n’t the answer to that question that wise decisions are made with a basis from memory ?
#Text=Although a computer can have …
#Text=No , no .
#Text=Forget memory .
#Text=Look , the new age is unprecedented .
#Text=When something is unprecedented , it means it does n’t have a past , does n’t have a history .
#Text=It ’s totally oriented on the future .
#Text=And whoever dwells in the past , does n’t understand the future because the past is full of prejudices , of commitments .
#Text=It arrests us .
#Text=And then you say you wo n’t commit a mistake , so you ’ll commit new mistakes .
#Text=It does n’t matter .
#Text=What about the adage , “ Those who forget history are doomed to repeat it ” ?
#Text=I say brains is the greater producer of wealth , not oil .
#Text=It ’s limitless , and you ’ll see that the GNP of Israel is very close to the Saudis ’ .
#Text=So they are 3 times larger than us and they have all the oil in the world .
#Text=We have brains .
#Text=— Peres , on whether the Arab states ' oil wealth will eclipse Israel 's prominence in the region .
#Text=So they will make new mistakes .
#Text=Mistake is inevitable as long as there are human beings .
#Text=But you cannot repeat mistakes because the world is not built on repetition ; it ’s built on mutation .
#Text=Do n’t you think Darfur is repetition ?
#Text=I think Darfur is , again , the last , or among the last battles between old and new .
#Text=What are they fighting for ?
#Text=What are they killing killing killing over ?
#Text=They do n’t carry futures .
#Text=It ’s not a mistake .
#Text=It belongs to a past .
#Text=It does n’t have a moment .
#Text=I am sure that the reasons for war are over , even though still there are wars which are an inertia from the past , a continuation that does n’t make sense .
#Text=I ’m answering your question .
#Text=The problem is how to enable the whole world to enter the new future , including the Arabs .
#Text=And there are already Arabs who did it .
#Text=Look at Turkey , who is knocking on the doors of the united Europe .
#Text=Why ?
#Text=It ’s not a geographic endeavor , it is an intellectual endeavor .
#Text=They say you can be Muslim and modern .
#Text=Like Dubai ?
#Text=Dubai…you must be very careful because Dubai is a small people with a large service sector .
#Text=The citizens of Dubai are almost unnoticed .
#Text=The rest are hired people .
#Text=Turkey is different .
#Text=Take Dubai or Qatar ; in Qatar you have 180,000 citizens with 700,000 foreign workers .
#Text=That also belongs to the past , because you see what ’s happening : they live on oil .
#Text=Oil is not produced by human beings , the producer of oil is the land .
#Text=It takes a million years to produce oil without any human interferences .
#Text=The need for oil is growing , so the cost of oil goes up which is forcing people to go to alternative energies to balance it .
#Text=Just because oil is discovered does n’t mean every year more and more and more people will pay for the same discovery .
#Text=To hell with you , I shall look for an alternative !
#Text=Even for Israel .
#Text=If you have to make a choice between Saudi Arabia and the sun , it should go to the sun .
